translated: Homage to all the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas.

original: dam pa'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: dam pa'i chos ni legs par gsungs pa /

original: tshangs par spyod pa /ğŸ”½thog mar dge ba /ğŸ”½bar du dge ba /

translated: pure in conduct,ğŸ”½virtuous in the beginning,
virtuous in the middle,ğŸ”½and virtuous in the end.

original: ma 'dres pa /ğŸ”½yongs su rdzogs pa /ğŸ”½yongs su dag pa /

original: @131b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa /
analyzed: @131b sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis chos 'dul ba legs par gsungs pa /

translated: It is meaningful to see this,

original: mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba /

translated: and is to be known by the wise.

original: chos 'dul ba legs par bstan pa /

original: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa /
analyzed: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gro bar byed pa /

original: mi mthun pa med cing mthun pa dang ldan pa /
analyzed: mi mthun pa med cing mthun pa dang ldan pa /
translated: He is without disagreement and endowed with agreement.
He is without interruption of the path.

original: chos rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: chos rjes su dran pa rdzogs so //
translated: The recollection of the Dharma is completed.
